title: Mile High Medical Society Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To recruit and provide full scholarship to one or more students each year pursuing training at the University of Colorado School of Medicine.
marketingContent: This fund was established in partnership with the Mile-High Medical Society to create new opportunities in medical education; help develop a more diverse, inclusive health care workforce for Coloradoâ€™s under-served communities; and support students historically underrepresented in health care (URiM), including those who are Black/African American, and pursuing medical training at the CU School of Medicine in perpetuity.
